name: PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions.authenticatorSelection
description: authenticatorSelection, an optional property of the PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions dictionary, is an object giving criteria to filter out the authenticators to be used for the creation operation.

refs.name: Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
